metadata.name: ZPVNK // 1.0
metadata.description:
ZPVNK // 1.0

Basquiat (on crack) is a stunning exploration of abstract art. This avant-garde piece is just the beginning of a series that promises to push the boundaries of the digital art world.

With burnable option, ZPVNK will transform and evolve with each new volume, offering collectors a truly unique and one-of-a-kind piece of digital art.
